about_the_game:
This Trashy Demo Features

Trash is heading over to San Francisco for the annual games conference GDC! This is your chance to play the limited time only GDC demo including;

-Solo or 1-4 player Online Multiplayer Co-Op
-Exploration & Resource Collection
-6 Craftable Player Character Attachments & Abilities
-A procedurally generated Hazard Dungeon
-An Exciting Biome Littered With Story Teasers




Explore an world years after humans have died out. Playing as a Morphite, new resin based lifeforms, venture out from the safety of your Cradle into a wild hazardous levels to collect rubbish resources.





Craft & Attach Forms to gain abilities that help you; explore, survive hazards, avoid creatures, help other players & collect resources. Players can attach up to 4 forms at once.





Each level contains a different procedurally generated Hazard Dungeon, ensuring high replayability. Their level locations are fixed, while the puzzles, layout and hazards within are generated.





The world consists of a series of 7 levels, each with hazards preventing resin life from flourishing. Help spread the influence of The Nexus (resin hive-mind) by solving Hazard Dungeons to remove these hazards while uncovering the story behind humanity’s ruin and the origins of resin life.

name: Trash GDC Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970/ AMD R9 290(X) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Trash is an co-op adventure crafting game where you restore balance to a trashy world. Jump, Glide, Shield or Smash your way around a wild world, complete procedurally generated hazard dungeons, interact with rubbish creatures and customise your character with crafted forms & abilities.
